name: merge-queue-init
description: handles a merge queue initiation with github actions

scripts.commit: git add . && git commit -am 'chore: add dist action'
scripts.release:patch: run-s build commit && npm version patch && npm run push
scripts.release:minor: run-s build commit && npm version minor && npm run push
scripts.release:major: run-s build commit && npm version major && npm run push
